description: Shannon Kelly can't swim. When at the beach she won't go into the water above her knees...so, why would she want to do Waterbondage AND be the first to try the "Rotisserie"? We place her in strict bondage, cut her clothes off, give her a water orgasm and ask her why! She faces her fear face down in the water and when it's all over she is rewarded with a very sexy suspension.
title: Shannon Kelly
